import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import'./ProductDetail.css';// Assuming you have a CSS file for styling
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductDetail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[product,setProduct]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProduct=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("/api/products/".concat(id,"/"));setProduct(response.data);}catch(err){setError('Error fetching product details');}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchProduct();},[id]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Add to Cart"})]});};export default ProductDetail;
